amendment.description: Amendment requires annual reporting by colleges and universities on how much of their endowment was paid out each year for the purpose of containing college costs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 110-523 to require annual reporting by colleges and universities on how much of their endowment was paid out each year for the purpose of containing college costs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch (VT) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
